name: Air Elemental
resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks
condition_immunities: exhaustion, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, restrained, unconscious

traits.Air Form: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

actions.Multiattack: The elemental makes two slam attacks.
actions.Slam: Melee Weapon Attack: +8+1d6 + 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
actions.Whirlwind (Recharge 4\u20136): Each creature in the elemental's space must make a DC 13+1d6 + 10 Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 15 (3d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage and is flung up 20 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked prone. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a DC 13+1d6 + 10 Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked prone.
